div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/payercharacteristics defines the following codes:

tr.td: Durable Medical Equipment, Prosthetics/Orthotics and Supplies.
Advances imaging techniques services (CT/PET Scans, MRIs) coverage.
Primary Care Visit to Treat an Injury or Illness
Benefit plan covers services rendered by a primary care physician during an office visit with the purpose to treat injury or illness, except for preventive care services.
Covered healthcare service rendered to a patient by a specialty provider.
Other Practitioner Office Visit (Nurse, Physician Assistant) - Mid Level Professional
Benefit plan covers covered health related services rendered by a practioner other than MD or DO and referred to as other practitioner.
Outpatient Facility Fee (e.g., Ambulatory Surgery Center)
Benefit plan covers health related services rendered to patient at an outpatient facility, outside of a facility that requires a patient admission.
Benefit plan covers surgical services rendered to patient outside of a facility admission, referred to as outpatient.
Benefit plan covers routine dental services.
Benefit plan covers eligible infertility treatment services.
A person who is hospitalized for at least one night to receive treatment or participate in a study.
A healthcare provider who is delivering healthcare services in a hospital environment.
Bariatric surgery service Skilled nursing service (qualifier value).
Cosmetic surgery service Skilled nursing service (qualifier value).
Delivery and All Inpatient Services for Maternity Care
Mental health service delivered in an outpatient setting.
Mental health service delivered in an hospital or inpatient facility setting.
Substance abuse related services delivered in a outpatient setting.
Substance abuse related services delivered in a inpatient setting.
Benefit plan covers outpatient rehabilitation services.
Benefit plan covers chiropractor eligible benefits.
Benefit plan covers Durable medical equipment eligible benefits.
Benefit plan covers advances imaging techniques services (CT/PET Scans, MRIs) eligible services.
Routine healthcare services to prevent health related problems eligible benefits.
Benefit plan covers weight loss services eligible benefits.
Routine eye exam for children eligible benefits.
Benefit plan covers rehabilitative speech therapy eligible benefits.
Rehabilitative Occupational and Rehabilitative Physical Therapy
Benefit plan covers rehabilitative occupational and rehabilitative physical eligible benefits.
Regularly scheduled, preventive care services, including immunizations, provided to children up to an age as specified by a health insurance company or mandated by a government agency.
Benefit plan covers laboratory testing and related professional services received as outpatient.
Benefit plan covers diagnostic imaging procedures that produce images of internal structures of the human body and uses radiation to diagnose and treat diseases.
Benefit plan covers diagnostic basic dental care.
Benefit plan covers orthodontia for children.
Benefit plan covers major dental care for children.
Benefit plan covers basic dental care for adults.
Benefits plan covers services provided that are required for orthodontic purposes for an adult.
Benefit plan covers major dental care for adult.
Abortion for Which Public Funding is Prohibited
Benefit plan covers services for abortion for which public funding is prohibited.
Benefit plan covers transplant related services.
Benefit plan covers dental care services related to an accident.
The plan benefit covers services used to treat end stage renal disease.

The plan benefits covers services for diagnostic procedures ordered or performed to evaluate whether a sensitivity to a substance is present. This test may be associated with specimen collection and/or substance administration challenge activities.
The plan benefits cover services the use of drugs and approved chemicals to treat disease.
The plan benefits cover services the use radiation to treat disease.

The plan benefits cover services related to instruction or training that encourages behaviors most likely to optimize health potentials through information about diabetes; facilitates the prevention of diabetes.
Plan benefit covers services related to prosthesis devices.
Plan benefit covers services related to infusion therapy.
Plan benefit covers services related to treatment of Temporomandibular Joint disorder.
Plan benefit covers services related to reconstructive surgery.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of days.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a set of actions covered.
Measure of services covered by the benefit plan expressed in relation to patient's acceptance for medical and nursing care in a hospital or other health care institution.
Measure expresses how many hours per visit are covered by the insurance benefit plan.
Measure expresses how many hours per week are covered by the insurance benefit plan.
Measure expressed how many hours per month are covered by the insurance benefit plan.
Measure expreses how many hours per year are covered by the insurance benfit plan.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a how many days are covered in a week.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a how many days are covered in a month.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a how many days are covered in a year.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a how many month are covered in a year.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits covered per day.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits covered per week.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits covered per month.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits covered per year.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of visits covered through lifetime.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of treatment actions covered in a week.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of treatment actions covered in a month.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of treatment actions covered in a lifetime.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number admission actions covered through lifetime.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number procedure covered per week.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number procedure covered per month.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number procedure covered per year.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number procedure covered per lifetime.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of days covered for each individual admission.
Measure of service covered by the plan benefit expressed in a definite number of procedures covered for each individual treatment episode.

'Catastrophic' health insurance plans have low monthly premiums and very high deductibles. They may cover worst-case scenarios, like getting seriously sick or injured. Patient pays most routine medical expenses.
'Bronze' type plan defines the estimated split costs of the plan, where patient is responsible for 40% of their healthcare cost while 60% is covered by the plan.

The 'extended bronze' plan is an addition to the bronze metal level which establishes the de minimis variation range for the actuarial value (AV) level of coverage to allow variation in the AV to -4/+2 percentage points.
'Silver' type plan defines the estimated split costs of the plan, where patient is responsible for 30% of their healthcare cost while 70% is covered by the plan.
'Gold' type plan defines the estimated split costs of the plan, where patient is responsible for 20% of their healthcare cost while 80% is covered by the plan.
'Platinum' type plan defines the estimated split costs of the plan, where patient is responsible for 10% of their healthcare cost while 90% is covered by the plan.
A health insurance plan with higher premiums and lower out of pocket cost than a traditional health plan.
A health insurance plan with lower premiums and higher out of pocket cost than a traditional health plan.

'Bronze' type plan defines the estimated split costs of the plan, where patient is responsible for 40% of their healthcare cost while 60% is covered by the plan.
